data.comment: The match is underway. Gent have kicked-off.
Roman Yaremchuk (Gent) sees red and is sent off in Kortrijk!
In the minute 31, Julien De Sart (Kortrijk) has received a yellow card from Wim Smet.
Eric Ocansey (Kortrijk) has received a first yellow card.
The first half has been concluded at Guldensporenstadion.
In the minute 46, Wim Smet blows to start the second-half. Kortrijk with the kick-off.
The home team have replaced Julien De Sart with Hannes Van Der Bruggen. This is the first substitution made today by Yves Vanderhaeghe.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Faiz Selemani.
In the minute 64, Gent make their first substitution with Laurent Depoitre replacing Elisha Owusu.
Christophe Lepoint is replacing Habib Gueye for Kortrijk at Guldensporenstadion.
Hein van Haezebrouck (Gent) is making a second substitution, with Sulayman Marreh replacing Milad Mohammadi.
In the minute 82, Hein van Haezebrouck is making the team's third substitution at Guldensporenstadion with Tim Kleindienst replacing Niklas Dorsch.
Christophe Lepoint (Kortrijk) gets a yellow card.
Michiel Jonckheere is replacing Faiz Selemani for the home team.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
